      post: The method returns the values that the user entered

      Read the prices for the materials of a certain hardware store
      pre: The user must enter positive double numbers that indicate the amount of materials that will be used for each type of these.

      Read the ubication of the dwelling
      pre: The user must enter an int number from 1 to 3, 1 means North, 2 means center, 3 means south

      Read for which work will each type of the materials be used
      pre: The user must enter int numbers from 1 to 3 for each type of the materials. 1 means rough construction, 2 means final construction, 3 means painting
      post: The method returns the values that the user entered
